headline: Are You a Value Investor? This 1 Stock Could Be the Perfect Pick
summary: Whether you're a value, growth, or momentum investor, finding strong stocks becomes easier with the Zacks Style Scores, a top feature of the Zacks Premium research service.

headline: TimesSquare Capital Management U.S. Mid Cap Growth Strategy Established a Position in The Allstate Corporation (ALL) in Q3
summary: TimesSquare Capital Management, an equity investment management company, released its “U.S. Mid Cap Growth Strategy” third-quarter investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. Within equities, smaller or value-oriented stocks in developed economies yielded higher, whereas emerging markets saw the opposite trend. In the third quarter, the strategy returned 4.96% (gross) and […]

headline: Allstate Announces Preferred Dividends Payable on Jan. 15, 2025
